content.description: Start with a crimpy boulder move to the first bolt. Follow four more bolts up the overhanging face on suprisingly good but sharp edges. join the route Pearl Sheath at its last bolt.
content.location: This route starts 5 feet right of The Black Dagger on the big boulder leaning up against the South Face of the Monolith. Both the approaches for the Back Door (detailed in the guidebook) or creeping along the base of the monolith work fine.

content.description: The crux of this muscly route involves a powerful throw to a good edge midway up. Although it's not too much to look at, this climb has some of the best movement in the area.
content.protection: Four bolts to a two-bolt anchor.
content.location: The Black Dagger is located on the big boulder leaning up against the South Face of the Monolith. Both the approaches for the Back Door (detailed in the guidebook) or creeping along the base of the monolith work fine.
